visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly temperature data with the series name 'Temperature'. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9) with specific margins for better spacing. The title and axes labels are styled with a dark gray color (#555) and appropriate font sizes. The x-axis categories represent months, and the y-axis title indicates temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes monthly temperature data with the name 'Temperature' and a custom color of tomato red (#FF6347). The legend is enabled and positioned to the right, vertically aligned in the middle, with vertical layout and styled with the same color and font size as the labels.
